Yep, your little spirit buddy made note of your "window" for sure.   :)  sf=

EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com writes:

 
 
 

Hello,

This email message is a notif=
ication to let you know  that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of=

group.

Uploaded by : =
 athena97531 <_athenamarmalade@..._ 
(mailto:athenamarmalade@...=
m) >  
Description : "Window" said as I was opening a window in a minivan. =
 

You can access this file at the URL:
_http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-=
ITC/files/Athena/11-10-23/1-window.wav_

riginal/members/web/index.html_

riginal/members/web/index.html) 
Regards,

athena97531  <_athenamarmalade@g=
mail.com_
